nodes.diffHunk: @@ -1067,6 +1068,46 @@ e.g. `smarthome:send actionCommand 'upd_timer["1498595904821", "on"]'` would ena | SpeedLevel | Number | Fan-Speed Level | | PhysicalControlsLocked | Switch | Physical Control Locked-Physical Control Locked | +### Mi Smart Home Gateway v1 (lumi.gateway.v1) Channels + +| Channel | Type | Description | +|------------------|---------|-------------------------------------| +| telnetEnable | Switch | Enable Telnet | +| doorbelVol | Number | Doorbell Volume | +| gatewayVol | Number | Gateway Volume | +| alarmingVol | Number | Alarming Volume | +| doorbellPush | String | Doorbell Push | + +### Mi Smart Home Gateway v2 (lumi.gateway.v2) Channels + +| Channel | Type | Description | +|------------------|---------|-------------------------------------| +| telnetEnable | Switch | Enable Telnet | +| doorbelVol | Number | Doorbell Volume |
